website_summaries.verdict: Large set that's sized especially for kids with shorter belts that will fit up to 27-inch waists.
pros: Set includes enough flags and belts for 14 players (two teams of seven)
Shorter belts stay in place better on children without pulling loose when defenders attempt to grab the flags
cons: Doesn't ship with a carrying case
No extra pieces offered for field marking

customer_reviews.title: Skinny youth
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a youth event. Some of the belts came off during play. Also, they're not made for bigger kids, you have to be pretty skinny for them to fit you. What we did is just forget about the belts and tucked the flags on each side, only using two flags instead of the 3 it comes with. Product came on time and in great condition. Overall, you can't beat the price, therefore, I gave them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughters b'day party and was disappointed. The package got here quickly, and it APPEARS to be a good quality, but the belts were way too small, like toddler size. I had kids ranging from 4-13 and it only fit the 4yos and barely the 6yo. I know they say you could double the belts but if I did that there wouldn't be enough for everyone. I returned the flags.
customer_reviews.author: kyra

customer_reviews.title: Not good AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use with our youth kids, and the flags were too small to fit around 90% of the kids. Which is ridiculous because none of them are very big at all. We tied them around our arms instead or held them in our hands. The actual flag part is cheaply sown to a velcro latch that gets put on the belt and it is so horribly sown that after one game of capture the flag, most of them were ripped from the velcro pieces. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND, especially for the cost. They are not good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product! The kids in my neighborhood have made a makeshift football field in an empty lot next to our house, and they literally spend hours playing flag football on the weekends. The quality is great, and you can tell that a lot of thought went into the product. My oldest son even asked if he could take it to school so they could play during recess! This is a fun way to get your kids outside (away from electronics) and into the fresh air. Very excited about this product, and I'm looking forward to seeing what this company offers in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Caraline A. Domb

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT, DELIVERED PROMPTLY
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Fast shipping and I loved the personalized customer service sharing creative ways to use the set and to make sure we were happy with the product My boys have loved using these to stay entertained with other kids at social gatherings and whenever the neighborhood boys all get together. The flags seem sturdy--haven't had any issues with malfunctions. A definite recommendation from me for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for flag football bday party
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my sons bday party, he had a flag football themed party and the kids had a blast. They worked great and I would definitely order from them again. The only thing when ordering just take note that they are all sized for kids so if you are hoping to have an adult play this will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The best flags for kids.  The belts are much shorter and fit them perfectly.  No more tripping on the belts.
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for kids. Usually, the belt is super long but these are much shorter and fit them great. The kit comes with 6 pairs in each color and a cool clip. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Walters

customer_reviews.title: Working well with the 12 yr old's for full-time league play flag football.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly the product is holding up to full-time league play use for 12 yr olds. I recommend. Feedback: 1) The kids come in all sizes, offer extensions to the belt, 1/3 of the team is husky = small adults 2) If possible create a quick release clip similar to the cargo straps or a pressure clip for quick belt changes We use this product heavily for practice 3 days a week and so far holding up.
customer_reviews.author: DXB

customer_reviews.title: !!!VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER!!!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT QUALITY!! This set is far superior to others I have owned and looked at. It arrived in two days and on a Sunday, at that. It was also packaged neatly. The flags were packed nicely so they weren't crumpled up like others I have purchased in the past. I am very pleased with this purchase and will look for other products from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: d. awesome

customer_reviews.title: Quality set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery, which you should expect these days. Excellent quality product (not flimsy and cheap), but still very inexpensive. Has plenty of extra velcro, etc, to deal w/ wear and tear down the road. One day out from Christmas and it's been used twice by the family including some uncles and cousins (pretty funny watching this go down!).
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Used in flag football games, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for kids. I would not use for high school aged or adults. We used these in our flag football games and they were great. I wish they came in a bag to keep them in & possibly other color flags rather than just yellow & red. But that’s not a big deal. I’d purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. My kids are a little small for their age (20 percentile for height / weight) and these belts are the best fit I have found so far. Were headed outside to use these again today after school on this lovely fall day!
customer_reviews.author: Greg D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids and easy for coaches/parents
customer_reviews.text: The belts are easy to put on, and the velcro is strong and holds well. We also used them as a "life meter" in a nerf war. Each time a kid was hit, they took a flag off. 3 hits and your out. Velcro flags made it easy to bring order to the chaos.
customer_reviews.author: Whereisyoursting

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We have had an excellent experience. The seller responded promptly to a question we had, and the flag football set arrived quickly. We tested it out this weekend at the beach ... it's a high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome! I bought it for my friend’s kids to play with over the holiday weekend. Since it was inexpensive I was expecting that it may fall apart but I only needed it to last for a few days, but after 3 days, and several hours of use, all the pieces were still in great shape and intact. The kids had so much fun and my friends got some great pictures of their kids and some adult time while they played.
customer_reviews.author: August Hewlett

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I used it ones and the flags started to fall apart in the middle of our game. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: No Football Required
customer_reviews.text: My son's school uses these for a team sport that they call Ketchup and Mustard Tag. He's so enthusiastic about the game that I bought this set to incorporate into his birthday party game, and when each guest saw that they were going to be playing Ketchup and Mustard Tag their eyes lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Great value for the price. My only wish is that they came with a bag or large enough box to keep it in once everything was assembled. It was impossible to repackage it back into the box they arrived in. Not a big deal, just a nit. I grabbed a jumbo size ziplock bag and am storing them in there. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A few Longer ones
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! The only difference I wish there was is different length in belts. I have some chunkier kids that can’t fit them so it would have been nice to have a few longer ones with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding flag football set!
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived quickly and was exactly as described. In fact, I was extremely impressed with the unexpectedly high quality construction. The set was neatly packed, and included a money-back guarantee and 30 day warranty. I was also very pleasantly surprised by an email about a week after receiving the set that described rules for flag football, as well as rules for several other games that can be played with the flags. Very nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Y.

customer_reviews.title: The kids enjoyed the "flag battle" at my son's birthday party
customer_reviews.text: Decent set for the price. The kids enjoyed the "flag battle" at my son's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rausch

customer_reviews.title: Great flag football set for kids
customer_reviews.text: Loving this set. My son takes it to school and the kids are so excited.
customer_reviews.author: Lllljjjjssss

customer_reviews.title: The belts fit nicely on ages 6-15
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to Uganda,. Africa for the kids to learn rugby. It was a huge hit. The belts fit nicely on ages 6-15.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to use for my Third - Fifth grade students
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to use for my Third - Fifth grade students. Although, they were too small for my larger fifth grade students.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set, durable, and flags come off with the right amount of force. Fits adults and kids. would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: This product is very well made though and perfect for rough playing kids
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product! We have rough kids in our neighborhood so I wasn't sure how well it would hold up. This product is very well made though and perfect for rough playing kids. The kids LOVE playing tag football which has entertained them thus far this summer. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Played tag football with Grand kids several times. Very pleased and still holding up strong etc...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Cool
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way it arrived! Package was strong and all in one piece when it arrived. I really like the colors being so bright because it seem to have caught the attention of the kids. I would happily recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flag football set. Well constructed and durable. Seller even sent an email with flag football rules of play and tips on how to make the most of this set. Excellent seller and fast shipping. Couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: We bought this product and are super impressed with the quality of it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product and are super impressed with the quality of it! We’d definitely recommend this product to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: shala613

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: My whole school uses these for recess. They have taken football to a kinder and gentler place in my urban school. Allows big and little kids to play together without fear of actual tackling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Flag Football Set Kids – Premium 14 Player, 62 Piece Kids Belts and Flags Kit Includes 3 Flags Per Belt Plus a Bonus 6 Replacement Flags
product_meta.description:
Our flag football gear for kids was specifically designed as a sport set for kids, boys and girls alike! This set of kids flag football belts and flags includes a custom 32-inch adjustable, durable nylon belt complete with secure D-ring closure and detachable flag system. To fit a larger waist, simply use the d-ring closure to secure 2 kids belts together to make a larger belt.

 Quality, hand-sewn attachments are used to secure the flags to the belt. The attachment is not sewn in place which enables you to slide the flags for flag football where you want them on the belt. This flexible feature allows you to adjust the belt size to fit each individual player without worry of flag placement.

With this 14-player flag football kit for kids there are enough flag football belts and flags to equip 7 players per team with a belt and 3 flags. When every player on the team is equipped and ready to take the field, game delays are minimized and the need for swapping belts when substituting players is eliminated. This flag football gear is also great for the young football player who wants to practice their skills and improve technique in the off-season with friends and teammates.

 For backyard play, 14 kids can participate in their game of choice! These flags and belts for kids are an excellent option to add a layer of fun to traditional games like tag, sharks and minnows, capture the flag and hide and seek, plus football pick-up games and scrimmages. This set is perfect for family gatherings, football birthday parties, beach fun, as a gift, and much more.

 Our flag football set for kids includes 6 replacement flags with your order. No other company makes this offer. 

Your satisfaction is very important to us! We offer a 30-day money back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with your purchase for any reason, please contact us and we will immediately resolve your issue!
feature_bullets: CUSTOM MADE FOR KIDS! Our 32-inch adjustable flag football belts for kids are 15-20 inches shorter than the average flag football belt on the market. Designed to fit up to a 27-inch waist with an inch or two to spare, our belt measures 1in W x 32in L.

BELT REMAINS SECURELY IN PLACE and only the flag comes off when a play is made. You can rest assured these youth flag football belts and flags won’t fall off during game play with the durable, double stitched nylon belt secured with 2 d-ring closures.

KIDS CAN QUICKLY REATTACH THE FLAG to their own belt thanks to the easy-to-use flags. This frees the coach to focus on the game in league play, and allows kids hours of continuous play in the backyard without having to ask for help. Each red and yellow flag measures 2in W x 15.5in L and is made of heavy duty vinyl to handle the rough pulls and tugs.

FUN BACKYARD GAME FOR KIDS. These quality flag football belts and flags can be used for a variety of kids sports, games and activities such as capture the flag, tag, sharks and minnows, hide and seek, beach fun, pick-up games, scrimmages, off-season training, birthday parties and more. If the whole family wants to play, simply use the d-ring closure to secure 2 kids belts together to make a larger belt.

BONUS: 6 REPLACEMENT FLAGS INCLUDED! We understand things happen...flags get lost in the abyss that is your trunk, get left behind at the field, or are used by your 4yr old to play tug of war with the dog. Not to worry, 3 red and 3 yellow replacement football flags are included with your purchase.
